## Educational Background
- **B. Tech (CSE)**, JECRC Foundation, Jaipur (2019)
- **Senior Secondary**, Shri Maheshwari Senior Secondary School (2015)

## Technical Skills
- **Web Development:** React, Angular, Next.js, TypeScript, JavaScript, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express
- **Database:** PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis
- **DevOps:** Docker, AWS, Git, GitHub Actions, Vercel, Linux
- **UI/UX:** Figma, CSS3, Sass, HTML5
- **Integrations:** Supabase, Firebase, Stripe, GraphQL, REST APIs

## Services Offered
1. **Full-Stack Web Development**: Building scalable, high-performance web apps using Next.js and React.
2. **UI/UX Implementation**: Responsive design, modern interfaces, and accessibility compliance.
3. **Performance Optimization**: Code optimization, database tuning, and caching strategies.
4. **DevOps & Deployment**: Docker containerization, AWS deployment, and CI/CD pipelines.

## Portfolio & Case Studies

### 1. Lumore: Cosmetic E-comm (Case Study)
- **Description:** A production-ready E-commerce Case Study demonstrating how AI can accelerate development cycles by 10x.
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion, Lucide Icons, Vercel.
- **Highlights:** AI-Native Architecture, 48h Build Time, 100% AI Assets.
- **Key Features:** Animated Hero with Product Orbit, Sticky Scroll Brand Story, Vertical Product Showcase, Parallax Products.
- **Concept:** Demonstrating the power of AI for end-to-end product development covering UI/UX and asset creation.
- **Live URL:** https://lumore.vercel.app

### 2. CultureTicks: Cultural Events Ticketing Platform (Client Work)
- **Description:** Scalable Event Discovery Engine handling 30k+ active listings with geo-spatial search.
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js, React, Node.js, PostgreSQL.
- **Highlights:** High-Scale Aggregator, Geo-Spatial Search, SEO Optimized, 30k+ Listings.
- **Impact:** 30,000+ events listed, SEO-optimized pages for search visibility, multi-city venue support.
- **Live URL:** https://cultureticks.com

### 3. Roamonn - Travel Platform (Client Work)
- **Client:** Bunkdays Outdoor Recreation Pvt. Ltd.
- **Description:** Enterprise Travel Management System with unified admin for group, corporate, and educational tours.
- **Tech Stack:** React, TypeScript, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, ShadCN UI, Vite.
- **Highlights:** Enterprise RBAC, Multi-Tenant System, Payment Gateways, Complex Admin.
- **Scope:** Built modules for Group Tours, Corporate Tours, and Educational Tours. Implemented a comprehensive Admin Dashboard with 10+ management modules.
- **Live URL:** https://roamonn.vercel.app/

### 4. Power BI Engineer Portfolio (Client Work)
- **Client:** Punit Gauttam
- **Description:** Interactive Data Engineering Portfolio featuring live SQL visualization and workflow automation.
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
- **Highlights:** Interactive Visualization, Workflow Automation, Data-Driven UX.
- **Key Features:** Power BI Dashboard Aesthetic, SQL Query Skills Section, Animated Career Timeline.
- **Live URL:** https://punitgauttam.vercel.app/

### 5. Superhuman Flow (Personal Venture)
- **Description:** Offline-First Productivity Suite (PWA) with local sync and focus analytics.
- **Tech Stack:** Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, PWA.
- **Highlights:** Offline-First PWA, LocalSync DB, Focus Analytics, Zero-Latency.
- **Story:** Built to give users control over their time without subscriptions or ads.
- **Key Features:** Customizable Pomodoro Timer, Ambient Sounds Mixer, YouTube Music Integration, Achievement System.
- **Live URL:** https://www.superhumanflow.com
